name: Audio Runner
description:
Audio Runner - With your loss of vision, can you escape with just your ears and a hungry set of creatures chasing you? Audio Runner is a runner game with no graphics, listen to the environment to remember your way out.

This was built in two-weeks by there was three of us with  full-time jobs or school.  We've never worked together before.

This game was originally for the two-week game-jam B&W GameJam. I had this concept in my head for awhile and thought what a good jam to try it out in. Then a day later another two-week game-jam started,   No Video Jam 2 and I was like what? No way, strange coincidence, this one's even better as it's No graphics!  It also met both themes. So I checked the rules and didn't see anything against to submitting to multiple and they were within the same dates! Seems like it was meant to be.

Mastro2k - Programmer

  • ccmm-composer - Sound Designer
  • Tiago Trotta - Voice Overs

Use keyboard or controller.
